sous_direction_lagadev_sest: Under his leadership, AGADEV is committed to transforming Gabon's natural capital into an engine for sustainable economic growth.
mettre_oeuvre_strategie_nationale: Implement the national strategy for the green economy by mobilising all the players concerned: public authorities, private sector, civil society and international partners.
faire_gabon_modele_developpement: To make Gabon a model of sustainable economic development in Africa, where economic growth goes hand in hand with preserving the environment and improving people's well-being.
notre_mission_principale_est: Our main mission is to develop Gabon's natural capital and promote green investment, positioning the country as a major player in the ecological transition in Central Africa.
titulaire_dun_doctorat_economie: Scyrielle Sende Etali holds a doctorate in environmental economics from Cambridge University and has 15 years' experience of managing international environmental projects. She has headed AGADEV since its creation in January 2025.
lagence_gabonaise_pour_developpement: The Agence Gabonaise pour le Développement de l'Économie Verte (AGADEV) is a public industrial and commercial establishment created in January 2025, under the supervision of the Gabonese Ministry of the Economy.
lagadev_joue_role_crucial: AGADEV plays a crucial role in Gabon's national strategy to reconcile economic development and environmental protection, particularly through the management of carbon credits and the promotion of innovative projects.
promouvoir_ladoption_pratiques_durables: Promoting the adoption of sustainable practices in all economic sectors and facilitating access to green finance.
nous_aspirons_gabon_capital: We aspire to a Gabon where natural capital is fully valued and contributes significantly to national prosperity.

lagadev_pour_ambition_faire: AGADEV's ambition is to make Gabon a leader in Africa's green economy, by transforming its natural assets into opportunities for sustainable development and creating an innovative economic model that preserves the environment while improving people's well-being.
notre_mission_est_positionner: Our mission is to position Gabon as a major player in the ecological transition in Central Africa by developing our natural capital and promoting green investment.

lagadev_a_ete_creee: AGADEV was created to valorize Gabon's natural capital
notre_mission_principale_valoriser: Our main mission is to valorize Gabon's natural capital and promote green investment, thus positioning the country as a major player in the ecological transition in Central Africa.
faire_gabon_modele: Making Gabon a model of sustainable economic development in Africa, where economic growth goes hand in hand with environmental preservation and improving people's well-being.
nous_aspirons_gabon: We aspire to a Gabon where natural capital is fully valorized and contributes significantly to national prosperity.
mettre_en_oeuvre_strategie: Implementing the national strategy for the green economy by mobilizing all stakeholders: public authorities, private sector, civil society and international partners.
promouvoir_adoption_pratiques: Promoting the adoption of sustainable practices in all economic sectors and facilitating access to green financing.
principes_qui_guident: The principles that guide our daily action
nous_promouvons_developpement: We promote development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
nous_visons_excellence: We aim for excellence in all our actions and projects, relying on scientific data and international best practices.
nous_agissons_avec_integrite: We act with integrity and transparency in the management of our projects and in our relationships with all our stakeholders.
nous_encourageons_innovation: We encourage innovation and creativity in finding sustainable solutions to environmental and economic challenges.
titulaire_doctorat: Holder of a PhD in environmental economics from Cambridge University and with 15 years of experience in managing international environmental projects, Scyrielle Sende Etali has been leading AGADEV since its creation in January 2025.
sous_sa_direction: Under her leadership, AGADEV is committed to transforming Gabon's natural capital into a real driver of sustainable economic growth.
lagadev_inscrit_cadre: AGADEV operates within a solid legal framework
relative_economie_verte: Relating to the green economy and sustainable development in Gabon

lagadev_oeuvre_pour_gabon: AGADEV works for a prosperous and sustainable Gabon through four main missions
lagadev_ambition_faire_gabon: AGADEV aims to make Gabon a leader in the green economy in Africa, by transforming its natural assets into sustainable development opportunities and creating an innovative economic model that preserves the environment while improving people's well-being.
pour_y_parvenir: To achieve this, we organize our action around four strategic pillars that reinforce each other and contribute to the realization of our common vision.
gabon_possede_forets: Gabon has one of the best-preserved tropical forests in the world, with more than 85% of its territory covered by forests. AGADEV works to valorize this natural wealth through forest inventories, biodiversity studies and conservation projects.
cartographie_evaluation_ressources: Mapping and assessment of forest resources and biodiversity
developpement_mecanismes_valorisation: Development of mechanisms for valuing ecosystem services
elaboration_projets_conservation: Development of conservation projects and sustainable management of natural resources
coordination_efforts_recherche: Coordination of research efforts on Gabonese biodiversity
forets_gabonaises_stockent: Gabonese forests store significant amounts of carbon, offering a unique opportunity to generate revenue through carbon markets. AGADEV develops and implements emissions reduction projects and supervises the sale of carbon credits on international markets.
developpement_certification_projets: Development and certification of carbon projects in compliance with international standards
facilitation_acces_marches: Facilitation of access to voluntary and regulated carbon markets
suivi_verification_reductions: Monitoring and verification of emissions reductions
repartition_equitable_benefices: Equitable distribution of benefits generated by carbon credits
lagadev_encourage_investissements: AGADEV encourages investments in projects and companies that contribute to the ecological transition, by facilitating access to financing and creating a favorable environment for green initiatives.
identification_promotion_opportunites: Identification and promotion of green investment opportunities
developpement_mecanismes_financement: Development of innovative financing mechanisms (green bonds, concessional loans)
accompagnement_technique_administratif: Technical and administrative support for green projects
pour_assurer_reussite: To ensure the success of the transition to a green economy, AGADEV conducts awareness and training activities for various actors in Gabonese society.
organisation_campagnes_sensibilisation: Organization of awareness campaigns on environmental issues
formation_fonctionnaires_entrepreneurs: Training civil servants, entrepreneurs and students in green jobs
publication_guides_ressources: Publication of guides and resources on the green economy
collaboration_etablissements_enseignemen: Collaboration with educational institutions to integrate the green economy into curricula

reponses_questions_frequentes: Answers to frequently asked questions about AGADEV and the green economy
reponse_credit_carbone: A carbon credit is a unit representing the reduction or elimination of one ton of CO2 equivalent from the atmosphere. These credits are generated by projects that reduce greenhouse gas emissions or increase carbon sequestration, such as forest protection or reforestation. They can be purchased by companies or governments to offset their own emissions.
comment_agadev_aide_projet: How can AGADEV help me develop a green project?
reponse_aide_projet: AGADEV offers comprehensive support for green project leaders, including: technical advice, connecting with potential investors and partners, access to specific funding, assistance with certification for carbon projects, and administrative support for regulatory procedures. Contact us via our online form or by email to discuss your project.
reponse_soumettre_projet: To submit a project to AGADEV, download the submission form available in the Resources section of our website, fill it out with the requested information (description, objectives, budget, expected impact), and send it to infos@agadev-gabon.com. Our team will review it and contact you to discuss next steps. You can also contact us directly for assistance in preparing your application.
quels_types_projets_eligibles: What types of projects are eligible for green financing?
reponse_projets_eligibles: Projects eligible for green financing generally include: renewable energy projects (solar, biomass), energy efficiency, sustainable forest management, reforestation, sustainable agriculture, waste and water management, ecotourism, and nature-based solutions. AGADEV prioritizes projects that demonstrate a positive environmental impact, create local jobs and contribute to sustainable development goals.
comment_agadev_monetise_credits: How does AGADEV monetize Gabon's carbon credits?
reponse_monetise_credits: AGADEV monetizes Gabon's carbon credits through several mechanisms: certification of emissions reductions according to recognized international standards (Verra, Gold Standard), negotiation of bilateral agreements with developed countries, sale on voluntary carbon markets, and development of partnerships with companies seeking to offset their emissions. The revenues generated are then invested in conservation and sustainable development projects in Gabon.

description_specialiste_carbone: You will be responsible for developing and implementing carbon certification projects according to international standards (Verra, Gold Standard).
exigences_specialiste: Master's degree in environment, forestry or equivalent. Minimum 3 years experience in carbon credits.
description_charge_projets: You will be responsible for coordinating and monitoring projects related to the green economy, in collaboration with national and international partners.
exigences_charge_projets: Bachelor's/Master's degree in project management, sustainable development or equivalent. 2 years experience in environmental project management.
description_juriste: You will provide your legal expertise on issues related to environmental law, carbon credit contracts and international partnerships.
exigences_juriste: Master's degree in law, specialization in environmental law. 5 years experience in the legal field.
description_communication: You will be responsible for AGADEV's external and internal communication, including social media management and event organization.
exigences_communication: Bachelor's degree in communication. 2 years experience in institutional communication. Excellent writing skills.
candidature_spontanee_text: You don't find an offer matching your profile, but want to join AGADEV? Feel free to send us a spontaneous application.

stages_description: We regularly offer internships in different areas: environmental project management, carbon certification, communication, legal, etc.
stages_duree: Our internships, lasting 3 to 6 months, allow young talents to gain practical experience in the green economy sector and contribute to concrete projects.
temoignage_marcel: Joining AGADEV was a decision that transformed my career. Here, I have the opportunity to work on innovative projects that have a real impact on the environment and local communities. The work atmosphere is stimulating and the team is passionate.
